title: Sins of Colonialism - Collection 17 (.. in Asia, Australia 4)
description:
Sins of Colonialism - Collection 17 (.. in Asia, Australia 4):

We have 30 titles here:

-  Anker - Declarations of Interdependence; a Legal Pluralist Approach to Indigenous Rights (2014)

-  Armitage - Comparing the Policy of Aboriginal Assimilation, Australia, Canada, and New Zealand (1995)

-  Arondekar - For the Record; On Sexuality and the Colonial Archive in India (2009)

-  Attwood - Telling the Truth about Aboriginal History (2005)

-  Bandyopadhyay - Caste, Culture and Hegemony; Social Dominance in Colonial Bengal (2004)

-  Bates (Eds.) - Mutiny at the Margins New Perspectives on the Indian Uprising of 1857, Vol. 1; Anticipations and Experiences in the Locality (2013)

-  Behrendt - Indigenous Australia for Dummies (2012)

-  Berkwitz - Buddhist Poetry and Colonialism; Alagiyavanna and the Portuguese in Sri Lanka (2013)

-  Chesterman & Galligan - Citizens without Rights; Aborigines and Australian Citizenship (1997)

-  Clark - Scars in the Landscape; a Register of Massacre Sites in Western Victoria, 1803-1859 (1995)

-  Daschuk - Clearing the Plains; Disease, Politics of Starvation, and the Loss of Aboriginal Life (2013)

-  Flood - The Original People; Story of the Aboriginal People (2006)

-  Heathcote - The Military in British India; the Development of British Land Forces in South Asia, 1600-1947 (1995)

-  Hezel - Strangers in their Own Land; a Century of Colonial Rule in the Caroline and Marshall Islands (1995)

-  Jackson & Manktelow (Eds.) - Subverting Empire; Deviance and Disorder in the British Colonial World (2015)

-  Kalveren - The Dutch Colonial System in the East Indies (1983)

-  Khan - India at War; the Subcontinent and the Second World War (2015)

-  Knight - Britain in India, 1858-1947 (2012)

-  Major & Bates (Eds.) - Mutiny at the Margins New Perspectives on the Indian Uprising of 1857, Vol. 2; Britain and the Indian Uprising (2013)

-  McGarr - The Cold War in South Asia; Britain, the United States and the Indian Subcontinent, 1945-1965 (2013)

-  McKnight - From Hunting to Drinking; the Devastating Effects of Alcohol on an Australian Aboriginal Community (2002)

-  Miller - Wronged by Empire; Post-Imperial Ideology and Foreign Policy in India and China (2013)

-  Morris - Protests, Land Rights and Riots; Postcolonial Struggles in Australia in the 1980s (2013)

-  Pattee - At War in Distant Waters; British Colonial Defense in the Great War (2013)

-  Read et al (Eds.) - What Good Condition; Reflections on an Australian Aboriginal Treaty, 1986-2006 (2006)

-  Reynolds - Forgotten War (2013)

-  Shaw - Our Heart is the Land; Aboriginal Reminiscences from the Western Lake Eyre Basin (1995)

-  Singh - The Testimonies of Indian Soldiers and the Two World Wars; Between Self and Sepoy (2014)

-  The Revolt in Central India, 1857-59 (1908)

-  Urban - The Economics of Ecstasy; Tantra, Secrecy, and Power in Colonial Bengal (2001)
